sentences.en: About 60,000 subscribers have special adapters to receive and decode the signals.
sentences.cn: 大约6万用户拥有特殊的适配器来接收和转换信号。

sentences.en: All the children will receive a small gift.
sentences.cn: 每个孩子都会收到一份小礼物。

sentences.en: Children at school receive coloured stars for work well done.
sentences.cn: 学校里的孩子表现得好会得到彩色星星。

sentences.en: Developments in South Africa receive extensive coverage in The Sunday Telegraph.
sentences.cn: 《星期日电讯报》全面报道了南非的发展。

sentences.en: If you would like to receive further information , return the attached form.
sentences.cn: 欲收到详细资料，请交回所附表格。

sentences.en: Just hit the F5 function key to send and receive your e-mails.
sentences.cn: 只要按功能键F5就可以收发电子邮件了。

sentences.en: Lee received 324 votes (= 324 people voted for him ) .
sentences.cn: 李得到324票。

sentences.en: She arrived to receive the sash of office from the outgoing president.
sentences.cn: 她走上前去从即将离职的总统手中接过了就职腰带。

sentences.en: She found herself on the receiving end of racist abuse.
sentences.cn: 她觉得自己遭到种族虐待。

sentences.en: She isn’t well enough to receive visitors yet.
sentences.cn: 她身体还不是很好，不能见客。

sentences.en: She went to New York to receive the award in person.
sentences.cn: 她亲自前往纽约领奖。

sentences.en: The encouragement that young boys receive builds a greater self-confidence.
sentences.cn: 小男孩受到的鼓励会增强他们的自信心。

sentences.en: The following evening the hotel was again receiving guests.
sentences.cn: 第二天晚上饭店又接待起客人来。

sentences.en: The organization now has around 18,000 members who receive a quarterly newsletter.
sentences.cn: 该组织现有大约18,000名成员，他们会收到一份内部通讯季刊。

sentences.en: The ten runners-up will receive a case of wine.
sentences.cn: 10位亚军会得到一箱葡萄酒。

sentences.en: They will receive their awards at a ceremony in Stockholm.
sentences.cn: 他们会在斯德哥尔摩举行的仪式上接受颁奖。

sentences.en: We're flattered and honoured to receive this Doris Day Award.
sentences.cn: 能获得多丽丝·戴奖，我们深感荣幸和光荣。

sentences.en: When we are off sick, we only receive half pay.
sentences.cn: 我们请病假的时候只能拿一半薪水。

sentences.en: Whole branches of science may not receive any grants.
sentences.cn: 各自然科学学科可能都得不到任何拨款。

sentences.en: Women must receive their fair share of training for good-paying jobs.
sentences.cn: 女性必须获得她们理应得到的高薪工作培训。

sentences.en: You normally receive 4 treatments each day, Sundays excepted.
sentences.cn: 通常每天接受4次治疗，星期日除外。

words.tran_cn: 被一般承认的；被认为标准的
接收器；接受者；收信机；收款员，接待者
接待；接收；招待会；感受；反应
接受能力；[生理] 感受性
收到；接受；迎接（receive的过去分词）

phrases.phrase: be at (或 on) the receiving end

trans.tran_cn: 收到，得到，承受，对…作出反应，收听/看，接待，购买，接/发球
收到， 接到， 领到； 接受， 得到； 接待， 接见， 欢迎； 遭受， 受到， 遭到
